Download the most recent quarto version from the quarto download site:
```bash
wget https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/releases/download/v1.3.450/quarto-1.3.450-linux-amd64.deb
```

Install the `.deb` file:
```bash
sudo dpkg -i quarto-1.3.450-linux-amd64.deb
```

Quarto does not add itself to the apt repository list, so you will have to check for updates and install as needed.
